text: ‘‘Nanna janangadavare, indu adhipatyavu nimage seride. Nivu bhumiyalli prabhavasaligalagiruviri. Adare, allahana prakopavu nam'ma mele banderagidare, yaru tane namage neravagaballaru?’’ Phir‌aun helidanu; nanu nanage tociddanne nimage heluttiddene mattu nanu nimage olitina dariyanne torisuttiddene’’
